strings.evolution:
First off, we need to be calm
and assess the situation.
strings.affinity:
The path that brought us together
surely will keep us together.
strings.description: A young lady who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Queen is a member of Akademeia's Class Zero, and as such undertakes perilous missions on her quest to become Agito, the savior or saviors. She can become quite demanding once her focus has turned to the mission at hand, unintentionally hampering the relationships she shares with the other cadets. When Machina blamed Class Zero for the death of his older brother, Queen simply dismissed his grief by calling him a "spoiled child."
strings.fusion: There is no time to be worrying about the past.
strings.summon:
Surely this too will be
important to my training.

strings.affinity:
The path that brought us together
surely will keep us together.
strings.description: A young lady who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Queen was taken in at an early age, and has since been raised as a cadet to become Agito, the legendary savior or saviors. Her personality is as straightforward as the longsword she wields, which has earned her the nickname of "class leader." On the battlefield her great knowledge of magic can prove invaluable, except in times of great peril where she ends up losing her cool.
strings.fusion:
Sometimes we lose ourselves
when the going gets rough.
Please, be my guide at that time.
strings.summon:
Leave it to me.
I'm an Agito cadet, after all.
